column4: has anyone been able to get Kindle for PC to work? Wine says its supposed to work, but I am unable to get it to run. It will install and uninstall, I have it in Win 98 mode. It starts, and then the window dissapears.
what does kindle for pc do?  i can transfer books to my kindle fine without wine
allows you to read your books from your account on your PC.
if you're already running in win 98, i'm not sure.  i just googled it a bit and that was all that turned up.
